footnotes.footnote: 2018-Dec-24 -Block 1 Weighted Average- Share Price represents average price between $57.35 and $58.33.
2018-Dec-24 -Block 2 Weighted Average- Share Price represents average price between $58.41 and $59.15.
Shares transferred from Reporting Person's Trust to Abigail LLC, a limited liability company of which the trust is a member.
Reporting Person disclaims beneficial ownership of all such shares.

BTR RA4-Represents the proportionate limited partnership interest in shares held by Rankin Associates IV, L.P. Reporting Person's spouse serves as the Trustee of the Trust which is held for the benefit of Bruce T Rankin. Reporting person disclaims beneficial ownership of all such shares.
